channel.title: OMFG help me with WMP please ^^
channel.description:
Well whenever I try and play a video that uses windows media player on sites like spiked humor etc., it just says ready but doesn't play the video, even when I keep clicking play =
If anyone can help me with this I'd greatly appreciate it, thx (H)[br][size=1]Posted at: September 19, 2006, 12:03:33 PM[/size][hr]plzplzpzlpzlzplzplzpzlpzpzlpzlz lols

item.title: OMFG help me with WMP please ^^
item.dc:creator: @Portal Portal
item.description:
@Portal wrote:

i have some .lol hdtv ones from like entourage and it works fine with those in both WMP and DivX Player although my preference is the DivX Player, I dont know why it just seems to be a more stable media player to me. Bummer on the not working part :-/

Read full topic
item.source: OMFG help me with WMP please ^^

item.title: OMFG help me with WMP please ^^
item.dc:creator: @xerozcheez xerozcheez
item.description:
@xerozcheez wrote:

Portal:

And i dont know if it would help or not but i have three media and/or audio filters that i use from downloading vids off torrentz, one is known as AC3Filter and the other as Vodei MultiMedia Processor, and last Ffdshow. With these I can play most everything in WMP or DivX Player with the latest codecs.

Yeah I had those, worked fine till I installed a 210 codec pack to try and watch a lol hdtv vid, it stoped WMP from playing some divX movies =, and the hdtv thing still didn’t work rofl

Read full topic

item.title: OMFG help me with WMP please ^^
item.dc:creator: @xerozcheez xerozcheez
item.description:
@xerozcheez wrote:

[quote=“Rictoo, post:3, topic:15357”]This has happened to me before:

  1. WAIT UNTIL THE VIDEO STARTS. DON’T PRESS PLAY AT ALL

That seems to solve it :P[/quote]

You sure? Lol, I’ll try it out

PaulT:

Nigga, please.

Cracker, please.

Read full topic
